import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cartAction' import './CheckoutItem.scss' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem: { imageUrl, name, price, quantity }, removeItem }) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
removeItem(cartItem)}>✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ removeItem: item => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
